# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-104">중요한 정보 유형 엔터티 정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-105">준수 센터의 DLP(데이터 손실 방지)에는 DLP 정책에서 사용할 준비가 된 많은 중요한 정보 유형이 포함되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready for you to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-106">이 항목에서는 이러한 모든 중요한 정보 유형의 목록과 DLP 정책이 이러한 각 유형을 검색할 때 찾는 내용을 보여 줍니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-106">This topic lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-107">중요한 정보 유형은 정규식이나 함수로 식별될 수 있는 패턴으로 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-107">A sensitive information type is defined by a pattern that can be identified by a regular expression or a function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-108">또한 키워드 및 체크섬과 같은 확증적인 증거를 사용하여 중요한 정보 유형을 식별할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-108">In addition, corroborative evidence such as keywords and checksums can be used to identify a sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-109">이러한 평가 프로세스에서 신뢰 수준 및 근접성도 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-109">Confidence level and proximity are also used in the evaluation process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-110">중요한 정보 유형에는 다음 구독 중 하나가 필요합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-110">Sensitive information types require one of these subscriptions:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span></span>

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-113">ABA 라우팅 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-113">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-114">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-114">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-115">서식이 지정되거나 서식 없는 패턴일 수 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-115">nine digits which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-116">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-116">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-117">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-117">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-118">0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 또는 8로 시작하는 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-118">four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-119">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-119">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-120">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-120">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-121">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-121">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-122">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-122">a digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-123">변형되지 않은: 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 또는 8로 시작하는 9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-123">Unformatted: nine consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-124">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-124">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-125">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-125">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-126">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-126">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-127">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-127">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-128">Func_aba_routing 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-128">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-129">Keyword_ABA_Routing의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-129">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-130">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-130">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-131">Func_aba_routing 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-131">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-137">abarouting #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-137">abarouting#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-139">americanbankassociationrouting #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-139">americanbankassociationrouting#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-140">americanbankassociationroutingnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-140">americanbankassociationroutingnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-141">bankrouting #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-141">bankrouting#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-142">bankroutingnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-142">bankroutingnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-143">라우팅 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-143">routing #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-144">라우팅 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-144">routing no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-145">라우팅 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-145">routing number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-146">routing transit number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-146">routing transit number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-147">라우팅 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-147">routing#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-148">RTN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-148">RTN</span></span>


## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-149">아르헨티나 국가 ID(DNI) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-149">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-150">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-150">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-151">8자리 숫자(기간 유무)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-151">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-152">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-152">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-153">8자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-153">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-154">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-154">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-155">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-155">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-156">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-156">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-157">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-157">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-158">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-158">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-159">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-159">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-160">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-160">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-161">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-161">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-162">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-162">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-163">정규식은 Regex_argentina_national_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-163">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-164">검색된 Keyword_argentina_national_id 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-164">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-169">cédula</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-169">cédula</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-170">dni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-170">dni</span></span>

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-176">호주 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-176">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-177">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-177">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-178">은행 주 분기 번호가 있는 경우 또는 없는 6-10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-178">six to ten digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-179">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-179">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-180">계정 번호는 6-10자리입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-180">Account number is six to ten digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-181">호주 은행 지점 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-181">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-182">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-182">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-183">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-183">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-184">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-184">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-185">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-185">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-186">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-186">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-187">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-187">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-188">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-188">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-189">Regex_australia_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-189">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-190">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-190">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-191">Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-191">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-192">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-192">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-193">Regex_australia_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-193">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-194">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-194">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->

  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-business-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-210">오스트레일리아 비즈니스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-210">Australia business number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-211">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-211">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-212">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-212">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-213">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-213">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-214">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-214">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-215">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-215">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-216">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-216">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-217">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-217">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-218">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-218">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-219">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-219">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-220">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-220">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-221">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-221">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-222">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-222">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-223">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-223">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-224">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-224">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-225">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-225">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-226">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-226">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-227">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-227">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-228">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-228">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-229">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-229">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-230">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-230">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-231">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-231">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-232">이 Func_australian_business_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-232">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-233">검색된 Keywords_australian_business_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-233">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-234">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-234">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-235">이 Func_australian_business_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-235">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-company-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-245">오스트레일리아 회사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-245">Australia company number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-246">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-246">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-248">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-248">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-249">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-249">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-250">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-250">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-251">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-251">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-252">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-252">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-253">9자리 숫자(디지타이터)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-253">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-254">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-254">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-255">9자리 숫자(디지타이터)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-255">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-256">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-256">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-257">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-257">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-258">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-258">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-259">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-259">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-260">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-260">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-261">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-261">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-262">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-262">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-263">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-263">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-264">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-264">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-265">이 Func_Australian_Company_Number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-265">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-266">검색된 Keyword_Australian_Company_Number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-266">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-267">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-267">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-268">이 Func_Australian_Company_Number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-268">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-278">오스트레일리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-278">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-279">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-279">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-280">9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-280">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-281">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-281">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-282">9개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-282">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-283">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-283">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-284">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-284">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-285">5자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-285">five digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-286">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-286">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-287">선택적 문자 1-2개(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-287">one to two optional letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-288">4-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-288">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-289">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-289">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-290">9자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-290">nine digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-291">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-291">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-292">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-292">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-293">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-293">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-294">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-294">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-295">Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-295">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-296">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-296">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-297">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-297">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-397">오스트레일리아 의료 계정 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-397">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-398">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-398">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-399">10-11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-399">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-400">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-400">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-401">10-11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-401">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-402">첫 번째 숫자가 2-6 범위에 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-402">first digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-403">9번째 숫자는 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-403">ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-404">10번째 숫자는 문제 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-404">tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-405">11자리 숫자(선택 사항)는 개별 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-405">eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-406">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-406">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-407">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-407">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-408">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-408">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-409">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-409">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-410">Func_australian_medical_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-410">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-411">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-411">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-412">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-412">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-413">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-413">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_medical_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-414">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-414">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-415">bank account details</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-415">bank account details</span></span>

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-424">호주 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-424">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-425">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-425">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-426">문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-426">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-427">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-427">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-428">1개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-428">A letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-429">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-429">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-430">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-430">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-431">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-431">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-432">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-432">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-433">Regex_australia_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-433">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-434">검색된 Keyword_passport 또는 Keyword_australia_passport_number 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-434">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-468">호주 세금 파일 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-468">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-469">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-469">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-470">8-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-470">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-471">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-471">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-472">일반적으로 다음과 같이 공백이 있는 8-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-472">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-473">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-473">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-474">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-474">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-475">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-475">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-476">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-476">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-477">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-477">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-478">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-478">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-479">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-479">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-480">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-480">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-481">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-481">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-482">Func_australian_tax_file_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-482">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-483">Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 또는 Keyword_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-483">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-484">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-484">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-489">medicare levy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-489">medicare levy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-490">portfolio number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-490">portfolio number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-493">individual tax return</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-493">individual tax return</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-494">tax file number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-494">tax file number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-495">tfn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-495">tfn</span></span>

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-496">오스트리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-496">Austria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-497">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-497">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-498">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-498">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-499">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-499">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-500">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-500">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-501">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-501">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-502">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-502">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-503">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-503">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-504">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-504">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-505">`Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-505">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-506">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-506">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-633">오스트리아 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-633">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-634">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-634">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-635">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-635">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-636">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-636">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-637">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-637">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-638">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-638">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-639">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-639">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-640">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-640">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-641">문자, 숫자 및 특수 문자의 24자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-641">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-642">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-642">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-643">24자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-643">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-644">22개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 ), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시 또는 더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-644">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-645">두 글자(대/소문자 구분 안 ), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시, 더하기 기호 또는 등호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-645">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-646">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-646">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-647">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-647">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-648">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-648">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-649">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-649">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-650">`Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-650">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-651">키워드가  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-651">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-652">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-652">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-653">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-653">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-657">오스트리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-657">Austria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-658">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-658">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-659">한 문자와 선택적 공백 및 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-659">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-660">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-660">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-661">한 문자, 7자리 숫자 및 하나의 공백의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-661">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-662">한 문자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-662">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-663">하나의 공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-663">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-664">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-664">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-665">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-665">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-666">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-666">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-667">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-667">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-668">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-668">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-669">`Regex_austria_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-669">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-670">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-670">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-671">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-671">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-672">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-672">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-673">`Regex_austria_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-673">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-674">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-674">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1c96ae4e-303b-447d-86c7-77113ac266bf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-social-security-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-695">오스트리아 사회 보장 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-695">Austria social security number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-696">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-696">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-697">지정된 형식의 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-697">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-698">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-698">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-699">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-699">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-700">일련 번호에 해당하는 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-700">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-701">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-701">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-702">생년월일(DDMMYY)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-702">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-703">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-703">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-704">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-704">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-705">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-705">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-706">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-706">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-707">이  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-707">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-708">키워드가  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-708">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-709">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-709">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-710">이  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-710">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Social Security Number -->
      <Entity id="6896a906-86c9-4d19-a2da-6e43ccd19b7b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-724">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-724">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-725">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-725">social security number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-727">sozialversicherungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-727">sozialversicherungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-728">sozialversicherungsnummer #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-728">sozialversicherungsnummer#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-729">soziale sicherheit kein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-729">soziale sicherheit kein</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-730">sozialesicherheitkein #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-730">sozialesicherheitkein#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-731">ssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-731">ssn#</span></span>

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-736">오스트리아 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-736">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-737">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-737">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-738">선택적 하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-738">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-739">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-739">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-740">선택적 하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-740">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-741">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-741">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-742">하이픈(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-742">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-743">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-743">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-744">슬래시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-744">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-745">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-745">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-746">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-746">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-747">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-747">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-748">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-748">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-749">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-749">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-750">이  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-750">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-751">키워드가  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-751">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-752">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-752">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-753">이  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-753">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-776">오스트리아 부가가치세</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-776">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-777">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-777">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-778">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-778">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-779">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-779">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-780">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-780">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-781">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-781">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-782">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-782">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-783">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-783">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-784">11자 영문자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-784">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-785">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-785">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-786">11자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-786">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-787">A 또는 a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-787">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-788">T 또는 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-788">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-789">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-789">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-790">U 또는 u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-790">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-791">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-791">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-792">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-792">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-793">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-793">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-794">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-794">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-795">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-795">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-796">1-2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-796">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-797">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-797">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-798">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-798">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-799">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-799">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-800">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-800">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-801">이 Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-801">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-802">검색된 Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-802">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-803">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-803">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-804">이 Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-804">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
