## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-822">Azure DocumentDB auth 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-822">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-823">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-823">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-824">문자열 "DocumentDb", 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자 및 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-824">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-825">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-825">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-826">문자열 "DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-826">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-827">3-200자 사이의 소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-827">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-828">기호(>), 등호(=), 큰 물음표(") 또는 아포스트로피(')입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-828">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-829">소문자 또는 대문자 86자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-829">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-830">등호 2개(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-830">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-831">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-831">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-832">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-832">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-833">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-833">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-834">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-834">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-835">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-835">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-836">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **일치하는** 콘텐츠를 찾지 못합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-836">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-837">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-837">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-838">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-838">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-839">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-839">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-840">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-840">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-841">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-841">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-842">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-842">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-843">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-843">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-844">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-844">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-845">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-845">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-846">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-846">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-847">testacs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-847">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-848">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-848">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-849">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-849">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-850">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-850">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-851">Azure IAAS 데이터베이스 연결 문자열 및 Azure SQL 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-851">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-852">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-852">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-853">문자열 "Server", "server", "data source" 및 그 다음에 문자열 "cloudapp.azure"를 포함하여 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열이 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-853">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-854">com" 또는 "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-854">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-855">net" 또는 "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-855">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-856">net", 문자열 "Password" 또는 "password" 또는 "pwd".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-856">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-857">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-857">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-858">문자열 "Server", "server" 또는 "data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-858">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-859">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-859">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-860">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-860">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-861">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-861">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-862">1에서 200 사이의 소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-862">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-863">문자열 "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-863">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-864">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-864">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-865">net" 또는 "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-865">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-866">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-866">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-867">소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 모든 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-867">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-868">문자열 "Password", "password" 또는 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-868">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-869">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-869">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-870">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-870">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-871">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-871">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-872">세미코론(;), 인용 부호(") 또는 아포스트로피(')가 아닌 하나 이상의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-872">one or more characters that is not a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-873">세미코론(;), 인용 부호(") 또는 아포스트로피(')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-873">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-874">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-874">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-875">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-875">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-876">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-876">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-877">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-877">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-878">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-878">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-879">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **일치하는** 콘텐츠를 찾지 못합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-879">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-880">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-880">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-881">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-881">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-882">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-882">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-883">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-883">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-884">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-884">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-885">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-885">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-886">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-886">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-887">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-887">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-888">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-888">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-889">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-889">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-890">testacs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-890">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-891">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-891">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-892">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-892">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-893">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-893">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-894">Azure IoT 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-894">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-895">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-895">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-896">문자열 "HostName" 다음에 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열("azure-devices" 문자열 포함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-896">The string "HostName" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-897">net" 및 "SharedAccessKey".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-897">net" and "SharedAccessKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-898">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-898">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-899">문자열 "HostName"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-899">the string "HostName"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-900">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-900">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-901">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-901">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-902">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-902">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-903">1에서 200 사이의 소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-903">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-904">문자열 "azure-devices.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-904">the string "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-905">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-905">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-906">1에서 200 사이의 소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-906">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-907">문자열 "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-907">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-908">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-908">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-909">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-909">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-910">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-910">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-911">소문자 또는 대문자 43자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-911">any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-912">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-912">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-913">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-913">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-914">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-914">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-915">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-915">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-916">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-916">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-917">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-917">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-918">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **일치하는** 콘텐츠를 찾지 못합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-918">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IoT Connection String-->
<Entity id="0b34bec3-d5d6-4974-b7b0-dcdb5c90c29d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-919">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-919">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-920">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-920">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-921">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-921">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-922">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-922">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-923">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-923">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-924">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-924">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-925">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-925">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-926">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-926">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-927">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-927">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-928">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-928">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-929">testacs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-929">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-930">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-930">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-931">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-931">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-932">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-932">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-publish-setting-password"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-933">Azure 게시 설정 암호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-933">Azure publish setting password</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-934">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-934">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-935">"userpwd=" 문자열 다음에 영문 문자열이 오게 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-935">The string "userpwd=" followed by an alphanumeric string.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-936">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-936">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-937">문자열 "userpwd="</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-937">the string "userpwd="</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-938">소문자 60자 또는 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-938">any combination of 60 lowercase letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-939">인용 부호(")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-939">a quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-940">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-940">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-941">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-941">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-942">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-942">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-943">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-943">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-944">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-944">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-945">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **일치하는** 콘텐츠를 찾지 못합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-945">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
<!--Azure Publish Setting Password-->
<Entity id="75f4cc8a-a68e-49e5-89ce-fa8f03d286a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords" />
       <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
           <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
       </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-946">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-946">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-947">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-947">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-960">Azure Redis 캐시 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-960">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-961">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-961">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-962">문자열 "redis.cache.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-962">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-963">net" 다음에 문자열 "password" 또는 "pwd"를 포함하여 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열이 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-963">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-964">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-964">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-965">문자열 "redis.cache.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-965">the string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-966">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-966">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-967">1에서 200 사이의 소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-967">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-968">문자열 "password" 또는 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-968">the string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-969">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-969">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-970">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-970">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-971">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-971">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-972">대문자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)가 있는 43자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-972">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-973">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-973">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-974">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-974">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-975">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-975">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-976">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-976">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-977">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-977">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-978">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-978">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-979">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **일치하는** 콘텐츠를 찾지 못합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-979">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-980">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-980">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-981">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-981">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-985">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-985">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-986">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-986">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-987">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-987">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-988">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-988">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-989">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-989">127.0.0.1</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-992">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-992">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-993">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-993">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-994">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-994">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-995">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-995">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-996">문자열 "sig", 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자 및 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-996">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-997">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-997">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-998">문자열 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-998">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-999">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-999">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1000">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1000">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1001">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1001">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1002">대문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호(%) 중 소문자 또는 대문자인 43-53자 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1002">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1003">문자열 "%3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1003">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1004">대문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호(%)가 아닌 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1004">any character that is not a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1005">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1005">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1006">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1006">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1007">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1007">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1008">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1008">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1009">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureSAS 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1009">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1010">Azure 서비스 버스 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1010">Azure service bus connection string</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1012">문자열 "EndPoint" 다음에 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열("servicebus.windows" 문자열 포함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1012">The string "EndPoint" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1013">net" 및 "SharedAccessKey".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1013">net" and "SharedAccesKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1014">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1014">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1015">문자열 "EndPoint"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1015">the string "EndPoint"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1016">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1016">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1017">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1017">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1018">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1018">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1019">1에서 200 사이의 소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1019">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1020">문자열 "servicebus.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1020">the string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1021">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1021">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1022">1에서 200 사이의 소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1022">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1023">문자열 "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1023">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1024">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1024">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1025">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1025">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1026">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1026">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1027">대문자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)가 있는 43자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1027">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1028">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1028">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1029">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1029">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1030">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1030">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1031">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1031">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1032">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1032">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1033">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1033">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1034">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **일치하는** 콘텐츠를 찾지 못합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1034">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1035">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1035">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1049">Azure 저장소 계정 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1049">Azure storage account key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1050">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1050">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1051">"DefaultEndpointsProtocol" 문자열 다음에 문자열 "AccountKey" 문자열을 포함하여 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열이 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1051">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1052">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1052">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1053">문자열 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1053">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1054">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1054">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1055">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1055">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1056">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1056">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1057">1에서 200 사이의 소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1057">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1058">문자열 "AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1058">the string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1059">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1059">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1060">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1060">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1061">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1061">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1062">대문자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)가 있는 86자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1062">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1063">등호 2개(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1063">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1064">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1064">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1065">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1065">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1066">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1066">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1067">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1067">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1068">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1068">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1069">정규식 CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter **일치하는** 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1069">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1070">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **일치하는** 콘텐츠를 찾지 못합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1070">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1076">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1076">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1077">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1077">contoso</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1086">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1086">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1087">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1087">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1088">Azure 저장소 계정 키(일반)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1088">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1089">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1089">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1090">아래 패턴에 설명된 86자 이하 또는 대문자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)의 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1090">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1091">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1091">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1092">기호(>), 아포스트로피('), 등호(=), 따오기 기호(") 또는 숫자 기호(#) 중 하나까지입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1092">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1093">대문자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)가 있는 86자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1093">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1094">등호 2개(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1094">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1095">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1095">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1096">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1096">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1097">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1097">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1098">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1098">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1099">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1099">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1100">벨기에 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1100">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1101">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1101">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1102">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1102">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1103">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1103">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1104">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1104">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1105">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1105">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1106">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1106">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1107">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1107">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1108">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1108">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1109">`Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1109">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1110">키워드가 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1110">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Belgium Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d89fd329-9324-433c-b687-2c37bd5166f3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1243">벨기에 국가 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1243">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1244">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1244">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1245">11자리 숫자와 선택적 디지타이터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1245">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1246">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1246">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1247">11자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1247">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1248">YY 형식의 6자리 숫자와 두 개의 선택적 기간 MM.DD 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1248">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1249">점, 대시, 공백의 선택적 디지타이터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1249">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1250">3개의 일차 숫자(남성의 경우 홀수, 여성의 경우 홀수)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1250">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1251">점, 대시, 공백의 선택적 디지타이터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1251">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1252">검사 숫자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1252">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1253">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1253">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1254">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1254">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1255">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1255">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1256">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1256">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1257">이 Func_belgium_national_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1257">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1258">검색된 Keyword_belgium_national_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1258">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1259">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1259">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1260">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1260">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1261">이 Func_belgium_national_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1261">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1262">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1262">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1321">벨기에 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1321">Belgium passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1322">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1322">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1323">2개의 문자와 공백이나 따로 문자가 없는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1323">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1324">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1324">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1325">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1325">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1326">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1326">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1327">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1327">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1328">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1328">Definition</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1329">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1329">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1330">`Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1330">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1331">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1331">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1332">정규식이 DD MM YY 형식의 날짜 또는 키워드를 찾거나 찾을 `Regex_eu_passport_date2` `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 수 `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1332">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1333">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1333">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1334">`Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1334">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1335">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1335">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d7b1315b-21ca-4774-a32a-596010ff78fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1359">벨기에 값 추가 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1359">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1360">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1360">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1361">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1361">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1362">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1362">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1363">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1363">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1364">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1364">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1365">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1365">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1366">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1366">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1367">12자 영문자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1367">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1368">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1368">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1369">12자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1369">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1370">문자 B 또는 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1370">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1371">E 또는 e 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1371">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1372">숫자 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1372">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1373">1에서 9까지의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1373">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1374">선택적 점 또는 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1374">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1375">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1375">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1376">선택적 점 또는 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1376">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1377">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1377">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1378">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1378">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1379">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1379">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1380">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1380">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1381">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1381">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1382">이 Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1382">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1383">검색된 Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1383">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1384">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1384">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1385">이 Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1385">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1386">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1386">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1387">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1387">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1388">nº tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1388">nº tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1389">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1389">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1390">vat no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1390">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1391">numéro t.v.a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1391">numéro t.v.a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1392">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1392">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1393">umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1393">umsatzsteuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1394">btw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1394">btw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1395">btw #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1395">btw#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1396">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1396">vat#</span></span>


## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1397">브라질 CPF 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1397">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1398">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1398">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1399">서식이 있거나 서식이 없을 수 있는 검사 숫자를 포함하는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1399">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1400">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1400">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1401">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1401">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1402">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1402">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1403">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1403">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1404">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1404">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1405">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1405">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1406">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1406">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1407">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1407">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1408">검사 숫자인 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1408">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1409">비형성:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1409">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1410">마지막 2자리 숫자가 검사 숫자인 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1410">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1411">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1411">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1412">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1412">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1413">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1413">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1414">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1414">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1415">이 Func_brazil_cpf 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1415">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1416">검색된 Keyword_brazil_cpf 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1416">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1417">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1417">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1418">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1418">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1419">이 Func_brazil_cpf 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1419">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1420">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1420">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1421">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1421">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_cpf"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1422">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1422">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1423">CPF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1423">CPF</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1424">Identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1424">Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1425">Registration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1425">Registration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1426">수익</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1426">Revenue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1427">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1427">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1428">Imposto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1428">Imposto</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1429">Identificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1429">Identificação</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1430">Inscrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1430">Inscrição</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1431">Receita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1431">Receita</span></span> 

   
## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1432">브라질 법인 번호(CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1432">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1433">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1433">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1434">등록 번호, 지점 번호, 검사 숫자 및 구분 기호를 포함하는 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1434">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1435">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1435">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1436">14자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1436">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1437">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1437">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1438">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1438">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1439">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1439">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1440">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1440">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1441">3자리 숫자(처음 8자리 숫자는 등록 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1441">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1442">슬래시(슬래시)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1442">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1443">4자리 분기 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1443">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1444">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1444">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1445">검사 숫자인 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1445">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1446">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1446">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1447">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1447">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1448">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1448">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1449">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1449">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1450">이 Func_brazil_cnpj 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1450">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1451">검색된 Keyword_brazil_cnpj 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1451">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1452">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1452">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1453">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1453">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1454">이 Func_brazil_cnpj 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1454">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1455">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1455">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1477">브라질 국가 ID 카드(RG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1477">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1478">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1478">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1479">Registro Geral(이전 형식): 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1479">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1480">Registro de Identidade(RIC)(새 형식): 11자리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1480">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1481">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1481">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1482">Registro Geral(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1482">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1483">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1483">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1484">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1484">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1485">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1485">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1486">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1486">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1487">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1487">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1488">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1488">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1489">검사 숫자인 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1489">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1490">Registro de Identidade(RIC)(새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1490">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1491">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1491">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1492">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1492">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1493">검사 숫자인 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1493">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1494">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1494">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1495">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1495">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1496">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1496">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1497">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1497">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1498">이 Func_brazil_rg 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1498">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1499">검색된 Keyword_brazil_rg 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1499">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1500">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1500">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1501">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1501">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1502">이 Func_brazil_rg 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1502">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-1503">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-1503">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
<Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
