- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4651">numéro de carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4651">numéro de carte vitale</span></span>

   
## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4652">프랑스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4652">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4653">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서 사용할 수 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4653">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4654">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4654">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4655">9자리 숫자 및 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4655">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4656">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4656">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4657">9자리 숫자 및 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4657">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4658">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4658">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4659">두 글자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4659">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4660">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4660">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4661">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4661">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4662">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4662">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4663">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4663">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4664">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4664">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4665">Func_fr_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4665">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4666">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4666">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4667">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4667">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4668">Keyword_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4668">Keyword_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4669">Passport Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4669">Passport Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4670">Passport No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4670">Passport No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4671">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4671">Passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4672">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4672">Passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4673">PassportID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4673">PassportID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4674">Passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4674">Passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4675">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4675">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4676">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4676">パスポート</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4677">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4677">パスポート番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4678">೺೺臲೺</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4678">パスポートのNum</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4679">パスポート ＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4679">パスポート ＃</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4680">Numéro de passeport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4680">Numéro de passeport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4681">Passeport n °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4681">Passeport n °</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4682">Passeport Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4682">Passeport Non</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4683">Passeport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4683">Passeport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4684">Passeport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4684">Passeport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4685">PasseportNon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4685">PasseportNon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4686">Passeportn °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4686">Passeportn °</span></span>

      
## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4687">프랑스 사회 보장 번호(INSEE) 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4687">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4688">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 사회 보장 번호 및 동등한 ID 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4688">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4689">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4689">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4690">15자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4690">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4691">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4691">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4692">다음 두 패턴 중 하나가 일치해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4692">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4693">13자리 숫자와 공백, 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4693">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4694">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4694">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4695">15자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4695">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4696">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4696">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4697">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4697">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4698">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4698">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4699">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4699">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4700">이 Func_french_insee Func_fr_insee 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4700">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4701">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4701">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4702">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4702">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4703">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4703">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4704">이 Func_french_insee Func_fr_insee 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4704">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4705">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4705">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4706">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4706">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4707">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4707">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_fr_insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4708">Keyword_fr_insee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4708">Keyword_fr_insee</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4709">insee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4709">insee</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4712">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4712">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4713">national identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4713">national identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4714">numéro d'identité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4714">numéro d'identité</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4715">no d'identité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4715">no d'identité</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4718">numero d'identite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4718">numero d'identite</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4719">no d'identite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4719">no d'identite</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4720">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4720">no.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4721">d'identite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4721">d'identite</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4722">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4722">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4723">social security code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4723">social security code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4724">social insurance number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4724">social insurance number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4725">le numéro d'identification nationale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4725">le numéro d'identification nationale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4726">d'identité nationale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4726">d'identité nationale</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4728">le code de la sécurité sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4728">le code de la sécurité sociale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4729">numéro d'assurance sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4729">numéro d'assurance sociale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4730">numéro de sécu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4730">numéro de sécu</span></span>

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4732">프랑스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4732">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4733">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4733">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4734">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4734">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4735">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4735">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4736">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4736">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4737">0, 1, 2 또는 3이 되어야 하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4737">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4738">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4738">1 digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4739">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4739">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4740">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4740">2 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4741">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4741">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4742">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4742">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4743">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4743">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4744">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4744">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4745">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4745">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4746">검사 숫자 3개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4746">3 check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4747">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4747">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4748">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4748">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4749">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4749">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4750">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4750">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4751">이  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4751">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4752">키워드가  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4752">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4753">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4753">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4754">이  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4754">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4774">프랑스 부가가치세 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4774">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4775">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4775">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4776">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4776">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4777">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4777">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4778">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4778">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4779">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4779">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4780">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4780">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4781">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4781">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4782">영문자 13자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4782">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4783">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4783">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4784">13자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4784">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4785">두 글자 - FR(대소문자 미구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4785">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4786">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4786">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4787">2개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4787">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4788">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 COMMA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4788">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4789">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4789">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4790">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 COMMA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4790">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4791">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4791">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4792">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 COMMA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4792">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4793">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4793">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4794">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4794">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4795">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4795">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4796">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4796">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4797">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4797">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4798">이 Func_france_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4798">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4799">검색된 Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4799">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4800">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4800">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4801">이 Func_france_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4801">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_france_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4803">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4803">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4804">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4804">vat number</span></span>

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4814">독일 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4814">Germany driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4815">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4815">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4816">11자리 숫자 및 문자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4816">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4817">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4817">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4818">11자리 숫자와 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4818">11 digits and letters (not case sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4819">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4819">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4820">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4820">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4821">6자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4821">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4822">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4822">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4823">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4823">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4824">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4824">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4825">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4825">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4826">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4826">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4827">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4827">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4828">Func_german_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4828">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4829">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4829">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4830">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4830">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4979">독일 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4979">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4980">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4980">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4981">2010년 11월 1일 이후: 9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4981">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4982">1987년 4월 1일부터 2010년 10월 31일까지: 10자리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4982">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4983">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4983">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4984">2010년 11월 1일 이후:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4984">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4985">한 문자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4985">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4986">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4986">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4987">1987년 4월 1일부터 2010년 10월 31일까지:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4987">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4988">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4988">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4989">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4989">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4990">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4990">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4991">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4991">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4992">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4992">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4993">정규식은 Regex_germany_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4993">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4994">검색된 Keyword_germany_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4994">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4995">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4995">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4996">Keyword_germany_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4996">Keyword_germany_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4997">오스와이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4997">ausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4998">gpid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4998">gpid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-4999">identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-4999">identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5000">identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5000">identifikation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5001">identifizierungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5001">identifizierungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5002">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5002">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5003">ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5003">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5004">id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5004">id-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5005">personal id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5005">personal id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5006">personalausweis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5006">personalausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5007">persönliche id nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5007">persönliche id nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5008">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5008">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5009">persönliche-id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5009">persönliche-id-nummer</span></span>


## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5010">독일 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5010">Germany passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5011">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5011">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5012">10자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5012">ten digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5013">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5013">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5014">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5014">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5015">첫 문자는 이 집합의 숫자 또는 문자(C, F, G, H, J, K)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5015">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5016">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5016">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5017">이 집합의 5자리 숫자 또는 문자(C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5017">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5018">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5018">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5019">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5019">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5020">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5020">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5021">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5021">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5022">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5022">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5023">Func_german_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5023">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5024">키워드가 `Keyword_german_passport` `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5024">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5025">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5025">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5026">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5026">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5027">Func_german_passport_data 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5027">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5028">키워드가 `Keyword_german_passport` `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5028">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5029">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5029">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5036">Reisepass-Nr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5036">Reisepass-Nr</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5041">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5041">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5042">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5042">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5043">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5043">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5044">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5044">passportid</span></span>

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5052">독일 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5052">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5053">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5053">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5054">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5054">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5055">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5055">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5056">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5056">11 digits :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5057">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5057">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5058">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5058">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5059">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5059">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5060">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5060">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5061">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5061">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5062">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5062">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5063">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5063">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5064">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5064">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5065">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5065">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5066">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5066">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5067">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5067">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5068">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5068">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5069">이  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5069">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5070">키워드가  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5070">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5071">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5071">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5072">이  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5072">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5073">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5073">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5074">Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5074">Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5075">identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5075">identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5076">steuer id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5076">steuer id</span></span>

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5098">독일 부가가치세 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5098">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5099">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5099">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5100">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5100">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5101">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5101">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5102">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5102">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5103">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5103">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5104">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5104">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5105">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5105">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5106">영문자 11자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5106">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5107">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5107">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5108">11자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5108">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5109">D 또는 d 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5109">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5110">E 또는 e 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5110">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5111">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5111">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5112">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5112">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5113">선택적 공백 또는 콤마</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5113">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5114">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5114">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5115">선택적 공백 또는 COMMA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5115">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5116">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5116">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5117">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5117">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5118">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5118">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5119">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5119">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5120">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5120">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5121">이 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5121">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5122">검색된 Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5122">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5123">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5123">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5124">이 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5124">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5125">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5125">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5127">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5127">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5128">vat no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5128">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5129">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5129">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5130">vat# mehrwertsteuer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5130">vat#  mehrwertsteuer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5131">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5131">mwst</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5132">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5132">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5133">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5133">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span></span>


## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5134">그리스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5134">Greece driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5135">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5135">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5136">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5136">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5137">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5137">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5138">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5138">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5139">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5139">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5140">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5140">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5141">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5141">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5142">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5142">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5143">`Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5143">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5144">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5144">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5270">그리스 국가 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5270">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5271">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5271">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5272">7-8자리 문자 및 숫자와 대시의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5272">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5273">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5273">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5274">7자리 문자 및 숫자(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5274">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5275">1개 문자(그리스어 알파벳의 임의 문자) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5275">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5276">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5276">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5277">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5277">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5278">8자리 문자와 숫자(새로운 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5278">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5279">그리스어 및 라틴어 알파벳 둘 다에 해당 대문자가 포함된 2개 문자(ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5279">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5280">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5280">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5281">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5281">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5282">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5282">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5283">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5283">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5284">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5284">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5285">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5285">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5286">정규식은 Regex_greece_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5286">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5287">검색된 Keyword_greece_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5287">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5288">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5288">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5289">정규식은 Regex_greece_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5289">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5290">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5290">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5291">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5291">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5292">그리스어 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5292">greek id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5293">그리스어 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5293">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5294">그리스어 개인 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5294">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5295">그리스어 경찰 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5295">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5296">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5296">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5297">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5297">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5298">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5298">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5299">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5299">ταυτότητας</span></span>


## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5300">그리스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5300">Greece passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5301">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5301">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5302">문자 2개와 공백이나 따로 숫자가 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5302">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5303">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5303">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5304">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5304">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5305">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5305">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5306">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5306">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5307">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5307">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5308">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5308">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5309">`Regex_greece_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5309">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5310">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5310">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5311">`Regex_greece_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM YY(예 - 28 8월 19일) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드가 `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5311">The regular expression `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM YY (Example - 28 Aug 19) or a keyword from `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5312">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5312">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5313">`Regex_greece_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5313">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5314">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5314">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7e65eb47-cdf9-4f52-8f90-2a27d5ee67e3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5330">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5330">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span></span>


## <a name="greece-social-security-number-amka"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5331">그리스 AMKA(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5331">Greece Social Security Number (AMKA)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5332">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5332">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5333">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5333">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5334">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5334">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5335">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5335">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5336">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5336">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5337">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5337">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5338">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5338">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5339">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5339">Eleven digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5340">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5340">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5341">YYMMDD 생년월일로 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5341">6 digits as date of birth YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5342">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5342">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5343">검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5343">a check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5344">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5344">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5345">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5345">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5346">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5346">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5347">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5347">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5348">이  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5348">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5349">키워드가  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5349">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5350">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5350">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5351">이  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5351">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Greece Social Security Number (AMKA) -->
      <Entity id="e39b03f4-50ea-41ae-af7a-a4b9539596ad" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5353">Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5353">Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5360">a.m.k.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5360">a.m.k.a.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5361">Αριθμού Μητρώου Κοινωνικής Ασφάλισης</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5361">Αριθμού Μητρώου Κοινωνικής Ασφάλισης</span></span>


## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5362">그리스 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5362">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5363">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5363">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5364">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5364">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5365">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5365">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5366">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5366">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5367">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5367">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5368">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5368">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5369">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5369">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5370">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5370">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5371">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5371">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5372">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5372">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5373">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5373">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5374">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5374">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5375">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5375">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5376">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5376">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5377">`Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5377">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5378">키워드가  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5378">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5390">tax number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5390">tax number</span></span>

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5407">HKID(홍콩 ID 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5407">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5408">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5408">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5409">8-9자리 문자 및 숫자와 마지막 문자를 선택적 괄호로 묶어서 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5409">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5410">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5410">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5411">8-9자리 문자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5411">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5412">1-2개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5412">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5413">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5413">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5414">검사 숫자에 해당하고 선택적으로 괄호로 묶는 마지막 문자(임의 숫자 또는 문자 A)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5414">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5415">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5415">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5416">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5416">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5417">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5417">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5418">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5418">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5419">이 Func_hong_kong_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5419">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5420">검색된 Keyword_hong_kong_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5420">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5421">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5421">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5422">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5422">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5423">이 Func_hong_kong_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5423">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5424">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5424">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5464">헝가리 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5464">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5465">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5465">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5466">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5466">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5467">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5467">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5468">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5468">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5469">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5469">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5470">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5470">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5471">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5471">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5472">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5472">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5473">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5473">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5474">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5474">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5475">`Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5475">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5476">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5476">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5492">driverslics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5492">driverslics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5493">driverslicence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5493">driverslicence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5494">driverslicences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5494">driverslicences</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-5495">driverslicense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-5495">driverslicense</span></span>
