## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7133">리투아니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7133">Lithuania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7134">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7134">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7135">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7135">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7136">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7136">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7137">8자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7137">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7138">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7138">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7139">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7139">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7140">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7140">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7141">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7141">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7142">`Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7142">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7143">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7143">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7144">정규식이 DD MM YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7144">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7145">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7145">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7146">`Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7146">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7147">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7147">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1b79900f-047b-4c3f-846f-7d73b5534bce" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7167">룩세르버그 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7167">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7168">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7168">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7169">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7169">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7170">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7170">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7171">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7171">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7172">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7172">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7173">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7173">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7174">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7175">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7175">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7176">`Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7176">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7177">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7177">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7301">룩세르부르크 국가 ID 번호(자연인)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7301">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7302">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7302">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7303">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7303">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7304">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7304">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7305">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7305">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7306">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7306">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7307">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7307">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7308">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7308">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7309">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7309">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7310">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7310">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7311">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7311">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7312">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7312">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7313">검사 숫자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7313">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7314">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7314">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7315">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7315">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7316">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7316">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7317">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7317">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7318">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7318">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7319">키워드가  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7319">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7320">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7320">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7321">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7321">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7344">룩세르버그 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7344">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7345">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7345">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7346">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7346">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7347">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7347">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7348">8자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7348">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7349">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7349">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7350">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7350">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7351">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7351">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7352">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7352">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7353">`Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7353">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7354">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7354">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7355">정규식이 DD MM YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7355">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7356">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7356">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7357">`Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7357">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7358">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7358">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="81d5c027-bed9-4421-91a0-3b2e55b3eb85" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7390">룩세르부르크 국가 ID 번호(자연인이 아닌 사람)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7390">Luxemburg national identification number (non natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7391">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7391">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7392">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7392">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7393">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7393">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7394">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7394">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7395">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7395">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7396">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7396">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7397">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7397">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7398">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7398">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7399">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7399">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7400">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7400">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7401">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7401">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7402">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7402">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7403">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7403">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7404">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7404">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7405">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7405">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7406">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7406">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7407">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7407">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7408">키워드가  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7408">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7409">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7409">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7410">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7410">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7450">말레이시아 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7450">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7451">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7451">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7452">선택적으로 하이픈을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7452">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7453">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7453">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7454">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7454">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7455">생년월일인 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7455">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7456">대시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7456">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7457">생년월일 코드 2자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7457">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7458">대시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7458">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7459">3개의 임의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7459">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7460">1자리 성별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7460">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7461">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7461">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7462">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7462">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7463">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7463">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7464">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7464">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7465">정규식은 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7465">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7466">검색된 키워드가 Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7466">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7493">몰타 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7493">Malta driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7494">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7494">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7495">지정한 패턴의 2자 및 6자리 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7495">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7496">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7496">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7497">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7497">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7498">2자(숫자 또는 문자, 대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7498">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7499">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7499">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7500">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7500">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7501">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7501">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7502">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7502">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7503">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7503">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7504">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7504">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7505">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7505">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7506">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7506">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7507">`Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7507">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7508">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7508">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7632">몰타 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7632">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7633">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7633">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7634">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7634">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7635">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7635">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7636">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7636">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7637">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7637">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7638">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7638">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7639">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7639">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7640">7자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7640">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7641">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7641">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7642">7자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7642">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7643">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7643">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7644">"M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z"의 한 문자(대소문자 미정)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7644">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7645">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7645">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7646">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7646">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7647">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7647">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7648">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7648">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7649">`Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7649">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7650">키워드가  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7650">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7651">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7651">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7652">`Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7652">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7653">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7653">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7654">Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7654">Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7655">citizen service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7655">citizen service number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7658">kodiċi personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7658">kodiċi numerali personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7659">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7659">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7660">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7660">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7661">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7661">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7662">numru ta' identità uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7662">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7663">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7663">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7664">numru tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7664">numru tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7665">개인 숫자 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7665">personal numeric code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7666">고유 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7666">unique identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7667">고유 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7667">unique identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7668">uniqueidentityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7668">uniqueidentityno#</span></span>


## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7669">몰타 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7669">Malta passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7670">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7670">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7671">공백 또는 디지타이터가 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7671">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7672">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7672">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7673">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7673">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7674">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7674">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7675">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7675">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7676">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7676">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7677">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7677">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7678">`Regex_malta_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7678">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7679">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7679">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7680">키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7680">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7681">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7681">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7682">`Regex_malta_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7682">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7683">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7683">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="b2b21198-48f9-4d13-b2a5-03969bff0fb8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7697">numru tal-passaport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7697">numru tal-passaport</span></span>

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7703">몰타 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7703">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7704">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7704">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7705">몰타 국가:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7705">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7706">지정된 패턴의 7자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7706">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7707">몰타어가 아닌 국가 및 몰타어 엔터티:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7707">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7708">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7708">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7709">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7709">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7710">몰타 국가: 7자리 숫자 및 문자 1자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7710">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7711">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7711">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7712">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7712">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7713">몰타어가 아닌 국가 및 몰타 엔터티: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7713">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7714">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7714">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7715">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7715">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7716">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7716">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7717">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7717">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7718">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7718">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7719">regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  또는 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7719">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7720">키워드가  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7720">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7721">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7721">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7722">regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 또는 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7722">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7729">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7729">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7730">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7730">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7732">numru ta' identità uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7732">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7755">네덜란드 시민 서비스(BSN) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7755">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7756">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7756">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7757">선택적 공백을 포함하는 8-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7757">eight-nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7758">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7759">8-9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7759">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7760">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7760">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7761">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7761">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7762">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7762">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7763">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7763">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7764">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7764">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7765">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7765">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7766">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7766">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7767">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7767">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7768">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7768">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7769">이 Func_netherlands_bsn 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7769">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7770">검색된 Keyword_netherlands_bsn 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7770">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7771">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7771">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7795">네덜란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7795">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7796">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7796">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7797">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7797">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7798">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7798">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7799">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7799">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7800">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7800">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7801">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7801">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7802">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7802">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7803">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7803">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7804">`Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7804">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7805">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7805">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7933">네덜란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7933">Netherlands passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7934">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7934">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7935">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 9개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7935">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7936">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7936">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7937">9개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7937">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7938">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7938">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7939">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7939">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7940">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7940">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7941">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7941">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7942">`Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7942">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7943">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7943">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7944">`Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM/MMM YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾는 날짜(예 - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7944">The regular expression `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7945">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7945">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7946">`Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7946">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7947">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7947">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61786727-bafd-45f6-94d9-888d815e228e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7965">네덜란드 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7965">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7966">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7966">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7967">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7967">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7968">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7968">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7969">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7969">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7970">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7970">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7971">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7971">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7972">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7972">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7973">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7973">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7974">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7974">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7975">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7975">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7976">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7976">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7977">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7977">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7978">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7978">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7979">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7979">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7980">이  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7980">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7981">키워드가  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7981">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7982">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7982">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-7983">이  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-7983">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8021">네덜란드 값 추가 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8021">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8022">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8022">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8023">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8023">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8024">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8024">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8025">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8025">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8026">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8026">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8027">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8027">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8028">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8028">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8029">영문자 14자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8029">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8030">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8030">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8031">14자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8031">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8032">N 또는 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8032">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8033">L 또는 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8033">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8034">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8034">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8035">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8035">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8036">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8036">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8037">B 또는 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8037">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8038">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8038">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8039">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8039">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8040">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8040">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8041">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8041">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8042">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8042">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8043">이 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8043">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8044">검색된 Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8044">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8045">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8045">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8046">이 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8046">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8047">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8047">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8048">Keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8048">Keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8049">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8049">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8050">vat no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8050">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8051">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8051">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8052">wearde tafoege tax getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8052">wearde tafoege tax getal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8053">btw nûmer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8053">btw nûmer</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8055">뉴질랜드 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8055">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8056">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8056">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8057">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8057">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8058">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8058">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8059">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8059">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8060">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8060">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8061">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8061">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8062">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8062">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8063">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 14-16자리 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8063">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8064">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8064">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8065">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 14-16자리 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8065">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8066">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8066">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8067">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8067">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8068">3-4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8068">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8069">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8069">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8070">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8070">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8071">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8071">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8072">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8072">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8073">옵션 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8073">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8074">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8074">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8075">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8075">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8076">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8076">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8077">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8077">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8078">이 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8078">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8079">검색된 Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8079">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8080">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8080">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8081">이 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8081">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8089">뉴질랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8089">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8090">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8090">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8091">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8091">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8092">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8092">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8093">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8093">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8094">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8094">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8095">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8095">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8096">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8096">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8097">영문자 8자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8097">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8098">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8098">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8099">영문자 8자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8099">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8100">두 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8100">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8101">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8101">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8102">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8102">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8103">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8103">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8104">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8104">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8105">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8105">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8106">이 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8106">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8107">검색된 Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8107">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8108">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8108">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8109">이 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8109">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8176">뉴질랜드 내륙 수익 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8176">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8177">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8177">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8178">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8178">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8179">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8179">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8180">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8180">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8181">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8181">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8182">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8182">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8183">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8183">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8184">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8184">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8185">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8186">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8186">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8187">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8187">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8188">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8188">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8189">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8189">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8190">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8190">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8191">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8191">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8192">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8192">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8193">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8193">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8194">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8194">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8195">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8195">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8196">이 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8196">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8197">검색된 Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8197">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8198">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8198">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8199">이 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8199">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
