- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8207">내륙 수익 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8207">inland revenue number</span></span>


## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8208">뉴질랜드 보건부 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8208">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8209">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8209">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8210">3개의 문자, 공백(선택 사항) 및 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8210">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8211">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8211">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8212">'I'와 'O'를 제외한 3개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8212">three letters (not case sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8213">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8213">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8214">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8214">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8215">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8215">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8216">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8216">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8217">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8217">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8218">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8218">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8219">Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8219">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8220">Keyword_nz_terms의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8220">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8221">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8221">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8222">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8222">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8223">Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8223">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8224">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8224">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8230">처리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8230">treatment</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8233">nhi no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8233">nhi no.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8237">국가 건강 인덱스 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8237">National Health Index #</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-social-welfare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8238">뉴질랜드 사회 일지 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8238">New Zealand social welfare number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8239">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8239">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8240">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8240">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8241">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8241">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8242">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8242">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8243">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8243">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8244">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8244">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8245">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8245">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8246">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8246">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8247">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8247">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8248">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8248">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8249">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8249">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8250">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8250">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8251">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8251">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8252">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8252">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8253">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8253">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8254">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8254">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8255">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8255">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8256">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8256">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8257">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8257">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8258">이 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8258">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8259">검색된 Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8259">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8260">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8260">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8261">이 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8261">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8263">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8263">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span></span>

## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8269">노르웨이 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8269">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8270">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8270">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8271">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8271">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8272">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8272">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8273">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8273">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8274">생년월일인 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8274">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8275">3자리 개별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8275">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8276">검사 숫자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8276">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8277">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8277">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8278">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8278">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8279">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8279">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8280">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8280">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8281">이 Func_norway_id_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8281">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8282">검색된 Keyword_norway_id_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8282">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8283">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8283">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8284">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8284">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8285">이 Func_norway_id_numbe 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8285">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8286">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8286">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8287">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8287">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_norway_id_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8288">Keyword_norway_id_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8288">Keyword_norway_id_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8289">Personal identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8289">Personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8290">Norwegian ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8290">Norwegian ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8291">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8291">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8292">Identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8292">Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8293">Personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8293">Personnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8294">F 내선 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8294">Fødselsnummer</span></span>

   
## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8295">필리핀 통합 다목적 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8295">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8296">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8296">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8297">하이픈으로 구분된 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8297">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8298">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8298">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8299">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8299">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8300">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8300">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8301">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8301">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8302">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8302">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8303">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8303">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8304">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8304">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8305">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8305">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8306">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8306">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8307">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8307">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8308">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8308">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8309">정규식은 Regex_philippines_unified_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8309">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8310">검색된 Keyword_philippines_id 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8310">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8311">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8311">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8312">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8312">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8313">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8313">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8314">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8314">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8315">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8315">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8316">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8316">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8317">폴란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8317">Poland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8318">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8318">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8319">슬래시 2개가 포함된 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8319">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8320">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8320">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8321">14자리 숫자와 슬래시 2개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8321">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8322">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8322">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8323">슬래시(슬래시)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8323">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8324">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8324">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8325">슬래시(슬래시)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8325">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8326">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8326">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8327">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8327">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8328">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8328">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8329">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8329">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8330">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8330">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8331">`Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8331">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8332">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8332">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8456">폴란드 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8456">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8457">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8457">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8458">3개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8458">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8459">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8459">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8460">3개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8460">three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8461">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8461">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8462">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8462">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8463">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8463">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8464">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8464">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8465">Func_polish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8465">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8466">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8466">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8467">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8467">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8468">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8468">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8472">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8472">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8473">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8473">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>

## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8478">폴란드 국가 ID(PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8478">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8479">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8479">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8480">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8480">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8481">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8481">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8482">YYMMDD 형식의 생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8482">6 digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8483">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8483">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8484">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8484">1 check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8485">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8485">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8486">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8486">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8487">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8487">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8488">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8488">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8489">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8489">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8490">Keyword_pesel_identification_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8490">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8491">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8491">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8492">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8492">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8493">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8493">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8494">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8494">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8500">niepowtarzalnynumer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8500">niepowtarzalnynumer</span></span>

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8506">폴란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8506">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8507">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8507">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8508">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8508">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8509">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8509">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8510">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8510">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8511">2개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8511">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8512">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8512">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8513">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8513">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8514">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8514">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8515">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8515">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8516">Func_polish_passport_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8516">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8517">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8517">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8518">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8518">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8519">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8519">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8520">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8520">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8521">Numer paszportu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8521">Numer paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8522">Nr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8522">Nr.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8523">Paszportu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8523">Paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8524">Paszport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8524">Paszport</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8525">폴란드 REGON 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8525">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8526">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8526">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8527">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8527">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8528">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8528">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8529">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8529">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8530">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8530">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8531">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8531">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8532">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8532">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8533">9자리 또는 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8533">nine digit or 14 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8534">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8534">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8535">9자리 숫자 또는 14자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8535">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8536">9자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8536">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8537">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8537">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8538">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8538">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8539">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8539">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8540">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8540">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8541">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8541">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8542">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8542">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8543">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8543">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8544">이 Func_polish_regon_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8544">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8545">검색된 Keywords_polish_regon_number 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8545">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8546">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8546">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8547">이 Func_polish_regon_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8547">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8548">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8548">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_poland_regon_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8549">Keywords_poland_regon_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8549">Keywords_poland_regon_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8550">regon id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8550">regon id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8551">통계 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8551">statistical number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8552">statistical id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8552">statistical id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8553">statistical no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8553">statistical no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8554">regon number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8554">regon number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8555">regonid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8555">regonid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8556">regonno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8556">regonno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8557">company id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8557">company id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8558">companyid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8558">companyid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8559">companyidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8559">companyidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8560">numer statystyczny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8560">numer statystyczny</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8561">numeru regon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8561">numeru regon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8562">numerstatystyczny #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8562">numerstatystyczny#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8563">numeruregon #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8563">numeruregon#</span></span>


## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8564">폴란드 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8564">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8565">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8565">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8566">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8566">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8567">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8567">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8568">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8568">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8569">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8569">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8570">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8570">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8571">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8571">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8572">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8572">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8573">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8573">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8574">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8574">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8575">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8575">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8576">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8576">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8577">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8577">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8578">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8578">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8579">이  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8579">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8580">키워드가  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8580">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8610">포르투갈 시민 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8610">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8611">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8611">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8612">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8612">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8613">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8613">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8614">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8614">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8615">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8615">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8616">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8616">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8617">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8617">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8618">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8618">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8619">정규식은 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8619">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8620">검색된 Keyword_portugal_citizen_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8620">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8621">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8621">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_portugal_citizen_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8622">Keyword_portugal_citizen_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8622">Keyword_portugal_citizen_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8623">bilhete de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8623">bilhete de identidade</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8624">cartão de cidadão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8624">cartão de cidadão</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8625">citizen card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8625">citizen card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8626">문서 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8626">document number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8627">documento de identificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8627">documento de identificação</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8640">포르투갈 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8640">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8641">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8641">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8642">두 개의 패턴 - 문자 2개와 특수 문자가 있는 5-8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8642">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8643">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8643">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8644">패턴 1: 문자 2자, 특수 문자가 있는 5/6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8644">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8645">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8645">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8646">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8646">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8647">5 또는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8647">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8648">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8648">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8649">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8649">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8650">패턴 2: 문자 1개와 특수 문자가 있는 6/8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8650">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8651">1개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8651">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8652">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8652">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8653">6 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8653">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8654">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8654">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8655">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8655">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8656">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8656">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8657">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8657">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8658">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8658">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8659">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8659">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8660">`Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8660">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8661">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8661">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8793">포르투갈 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8793">Portugal passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8794">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8794">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8795">1개의 문자와 공백 또는 디지타이터가 없는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8795">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8796">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8796">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8797">한 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8797">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8798">한 문자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8798">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8799">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8799">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8800">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8800">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8801">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8801">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8802">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8802">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8803">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8803">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8804">`Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8804">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8805">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8805">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8806">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8806">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8807">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8807">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8808">`Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8808">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8809">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8809">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="080a52fd-a7bc-431e-b54d-51f08f59db11" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8836">포르투갈 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8836">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8837">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8837">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8838">선택적 공백이 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8838">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8839">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8839">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8840">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8840">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8841">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8841">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8842">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8842">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8843">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8843">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8844">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8844">3 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8845">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8845">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8846">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8846">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8847">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8847">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8848">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8848">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8849">이  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8849">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8850">키워드가  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8850">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8851">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8851">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8852">이  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8852">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8877">루마니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8877">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8878">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8878">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8879">한 문자와 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8879">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8880">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8880">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8881">한 문자와 8자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8881">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8882">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 되거나) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8882">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8883">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8883">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8884">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8884">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8885">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8885">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8886">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8886">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8887">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8887">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8888">`Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8888">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-8889">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-8889">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9017">루마니아 CNP(개인 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9017">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9018">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9018">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9019">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9019">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9020">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9020">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9021">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9021">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9022">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9022">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9023">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9023">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9024">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9024">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9025">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9025">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9026">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9026">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9027">1-9에서 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9027">1 digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9028">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자(YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9028">6 digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9029">01-52 또는 99일 수 있는 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9029">2 digits which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9030">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9030">4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9031">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9031">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9032">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9032">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9033">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9033">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9034">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9034">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9035">이  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9035">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9036">키워드가  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9036">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9037">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9037">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9038">이  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9038">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9089">루마니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9089">Romania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9090">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9090">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9091">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9091">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9092">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9092">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9093">8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9093">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9094">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9094">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9095">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9095">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9096">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9096">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9097">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9097">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9098">`Regex_romania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9098">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9099">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9099">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9100">`Regex_romania_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM/MMM YY(예제- 01 FEB/FEB 10) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9100">The regular expression `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (Example- 01 FEB/FEB 10) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9101">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9101">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9102">`Regex_romania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9102">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9103">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9103">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5d31b90c-7fe2-4a76-a14b-767b8fd19d6c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9128">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9128">Format</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9139">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9139">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9140">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9140">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9141">regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9141">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9142">검색된 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9142">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9166">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9166">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9174">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9174">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9175">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9175">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9176">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9176">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9177">regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9177">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9178">검색된 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9178">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9185">passportno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9185">passportno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9186">passportnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9186">passportnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9187">паспорт нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9187">паспорт нет</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9188">рра ра рр а 1015 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9188">паспорт id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9189">pоссийской ра рра рраа рраа ара рра ра</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9189">pоссийской паспорт</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9190">pусский рранн ран рананн.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9190">pусский номер паспорта</span></span>

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9195">사우디 아라비아 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9195">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9196">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9196">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9197">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9197">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9198">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9198">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9199">10자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9199">ten consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9200">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9200">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9201">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9201">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9202">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9202">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9203">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9203">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9204">Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9204">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9205">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9205">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9206">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9206">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9207">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9207">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9208">Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9208">Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9209">I card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9209">I card number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9210">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9210">ID number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9211">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9211">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9212">싱가포르 NRIC(국가 등록 ID 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9212">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9213">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9213">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9214">9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9214">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9215">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9215">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9216">9개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9216">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9217">문자 "F", "G", "S" 또는 "T"(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9217">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9218">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9218">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9219">알파벳 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9219">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9220">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9220">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9221">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9221">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9222">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9222">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9223">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9223">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9224">정규식은 Regex_singapore_nric 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9224">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9225">검색된 키워드가 Keyword_singapore_nric 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9225">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9226">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9226">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9227">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9227">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9228">정규식은 Regex_singapore_nric 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9228">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9229">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9229">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
