## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9240">슬로바키아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9240">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9241">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9241">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9242">한 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9242">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9243">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9243">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9244">한 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9244">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9245">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 되거나) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9245">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9246">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9246">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9247">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9247">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9248">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9248">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9249">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9249">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9250">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9250">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9251">`Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9251">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9252">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9252">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9378">슬로바키아 개인 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9378">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9379">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9379">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9380">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9380">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9381">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9381">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9382">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9382">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9383">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9383">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9384">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9384">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9385">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9385">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9386">선택적 백사시를 포함하는 9자리 또는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9386">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9387">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9387">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9388">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9388">6 digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9389">선택적 슬래시(/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9389">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9390">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9390">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9391">선택적 검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9391">1 optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9392">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9392">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9393">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9393">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9394">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9394">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9395">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9395">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9396">이  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9396">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9397">키워드가  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9397">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9398">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9398">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9399">이  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9399">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9446">슬로바키아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9446">Slovakia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9447">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9447">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9448">1자리 숫자 또는 문자, 공백이나 따로 공백이 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9448">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9449">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9449">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9450">1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ),7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9450">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9451">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9451">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9452">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9452">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9453">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9453">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9454">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9454">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9455">`Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9455">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9456">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9456">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9457">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9457">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9458">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9458">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9459">`Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9459">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9460">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9460">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="238e1f08-d80e-4793-af33-9b57918335b7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9482">스로베니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9482">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9483">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9483">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9484">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9484">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9485">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9485">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9486">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9486">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9487">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9487">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9488">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9488">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9489">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9489">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9490">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9490">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9491">`Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9491">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9492">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9492">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9619">스로베니아 고유 마스터 시민 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9619">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9620">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9620">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9621">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9621">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9622">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9622">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9623">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9623">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9624">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9624">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9625">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9625">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9626">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9626">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9627">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9627">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9628">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9628">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9629">지정된 패턴의 13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9629">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9630">생년월일(DDMMLLL)에 해당하는 7자리 숫자입니다. 여기서 "LLL"은 생년월일의 마지막 세 자리 숫자에 해당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9630">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9631">생년월일 "50"에 해당하는 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9631">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9632">같은 날에 태어나는 사람의 성별 및 일련 번호 조합에 해당하는 3자리 숫자(남성 000-499, 여성의 경우 500-999)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9632">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9633">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9633">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9634">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9634">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9635">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9635">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9636">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9636">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9637">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9637">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9638">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9638">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9639">키워드가  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9639">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9640">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9640">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9641">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9641">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9669">스로베니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9669">Slovenia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9670">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9670">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9671">2개의 문자와 공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9671">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9672">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9672">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9673">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9673">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9674">문자 "P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9674">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9675">대문자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9675">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9676">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9676">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9677">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9677">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9678">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9678">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9679">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9679">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9680">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9680">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9681">`Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9681">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9682">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9682">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9683">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9683">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9684">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9684">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9685">`Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9685">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9686">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9686">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="235b7976-7bbe-4df5-bb40-08678e749d1a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9708">만료 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9708">date of expiry</span></span>


## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9709">스로베니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9709">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9710">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9710">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9711">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9711">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9712">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9712">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9713">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9713">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9714">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9714">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9715">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9715">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9716">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9716">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9717">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9717">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9718">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9718">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9719">1-9에서 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9719">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9720">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9720">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9721">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9721">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9722">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9722">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9723">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9723">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9724">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9724">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9725">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9725">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9726">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9726">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9727">키워드가  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9727">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9728">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9728">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9729">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9729">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9753">남아프리카 공화국 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9753">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9754">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9754">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9755">공백을 포함할 수 있는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9755">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9756">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9756">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9757">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9757">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9758">생년월일인 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9758">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9759">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9759">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9760">한 자리 숫자 시민권 표시기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9760">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9761">숫자 "8" 또는 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9761">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9762">체크 아웃 숫자인 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9762">one digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9763">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9763">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9764">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9764">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9765">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9765">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9766">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9766">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9767">이 Func_south_africa_identification_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9767">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9768">검색된 Keyword_south_africa_identification_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9768">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9769">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9769">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9770">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9770">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9771">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9771">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9772">Identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9772">Identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9773">ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9773">ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9774">Identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9774">Identification</span></span> 
   
## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9775">대한민국 거주자 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9775">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9776">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9776">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9777">하이픈을 포함하는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9777">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9778">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9778">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9779">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9779">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9780">생년월일인 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9780">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9781">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9781">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9782">세기 및 성별로 결정된 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9782">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9783">4자리 생년월일 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9783">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9784">앞의 숫자가 동일한 사람들을 차별화하는 데 사용되는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9784">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9785">검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9785">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9786">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9786">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9787">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9787">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9788">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9788">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9789">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9789">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9790">이 Func_south_korea_resident_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9790">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9791">검색된 Keyword_south_korea_resident_number 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9791">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9792">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9792">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9793">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9793">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9794">이 Func_south_korea_resident_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9794">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9795">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9795">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9796">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9796">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9797">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9797">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9798">National ID card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9798">National ID card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9799">Citizen's Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9799">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9800">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9800">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9801">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9801">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9802">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9802">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9803">스페인 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9803">Spain driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9804">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9804">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9805">8자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9805">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9806">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9806">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9807">8자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9807">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9808">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9808">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9809">1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9809">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9810">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9810">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9811">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9811">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9812">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9812">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9813">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9813">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9814">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 패턴과 일치하는 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 콘텐츠를 찾거나 함수를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9814">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9815">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9815">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9816">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9816">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9817">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 함수를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9817">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9951">스페인 DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9951">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9952">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9952">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9953">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9953">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9954">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9954">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9955">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9955">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9956">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9956">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9957">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9957">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9958">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9958">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9959">8자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9959">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9960">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9960">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9961">7자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9961">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9962">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9962">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9963">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9963">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9964">검사 문자 1개(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9964">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9965">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9965">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9966">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9966">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9967">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9967">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9968">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9968">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9969">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 패턴과 일치하는 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 콘텐츠를 찾거나 함수를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9969">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9970">키워드가  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9970">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9971">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9971">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9972">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 패턴과 일치하는 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 콘텐츠를 찾거나 함수를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9972">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9996">스페인 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9996">Spain passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9997">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9997">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9998">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 문자와 숫자의 8 또는 9자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9998">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-9999">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-9999">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10000">8-9자 또는 9자 조합 문자와 숫자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10000">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10001">2자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10001">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10002">1자리 숫자 또는 문자(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10002">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10003">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10003">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10004">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10004">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10005">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10005">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10006">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10006">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10007">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10007">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10008">`Regex_spain_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10008">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10009">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10009">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10010">`Regex_spain_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD-MM-YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10010">The regular expression `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD-MM-YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10011">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10011">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10012">`Regex_spain_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10012">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10013">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10013">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d17a57de-9fa5-4e9f-85d3-85c26d89686e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10042">스페인 SSN(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10042">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10043">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10043">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10044">11-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10044">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10045">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10045">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10046">11-12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10046">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10047">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10047">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10048">슬래시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10048">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10049">7~8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10049">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10050">슬래시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10050">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10051">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10051">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10052">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10052">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10053">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10053">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10054">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10054">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10055">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10055">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10056">Func_spanish_social_security_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10056">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10057">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10057">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10058">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10058">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10059">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10059">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10060">스페인 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10060">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10061">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10061">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10062">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10062">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10063">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10063">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10064">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10064">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10065">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10065">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10066">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10066">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10067">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10067">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10068">지정한 패턴의 7-8자리 숫자와 1-2개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10068">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10069">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10069">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10070">스페인 국가 ID 카드가 있는 스페인어 자연인:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10070">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10071">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10071">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10072">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10072">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10073">스페인 국가 ID 카드가 없는 비 거주자 Spaniards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10073">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10074">대문자 1자 "L"(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10074">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10075">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10075">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10076">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10076">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10077">스페인 국가 ID 카드가 없는 14세 미만 거주자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10077">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10078">대문자 "K"(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10078">one uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10079">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10079">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10080">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10080">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10081">내국인 식별 번호가 있는 외신</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10081">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10082">"X", "Y" 또는 "Z"(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10082">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10083">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10083">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10084">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10084">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10085">외신의 ID 번호가 없는 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10085">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10086">"M"(대소문자 구분)의 대문자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10086">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10087">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10087">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10088">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10088">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10089">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10089">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10090">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10090">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10091">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10091">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10092">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10092">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10093">해당  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치하는 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 콘텐츠를 찾거나 함수를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10093">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10094">키워드가  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10094">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10095">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10095">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10096">해당  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치하는 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 콘텐츠를 찾거나 함수를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10096">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10127">SQL Server 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10127">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10128">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10128">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10129">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId" 다음에 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10129">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10130">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10130">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10131">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10131">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10132">1에서 200 사이의 소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10132">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10133">문자열 "Password" 또는 "pwd" 여기서 "pwd"는 소문자 앞에 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10133">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10134">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10134">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10135">달러 기호($), 백분율 기호(%), 기호(>), 기호(@), 인용 부호("), 세미클론(;), 왼쪽 중괄호([) 또는 왼쪽 대괄호({)가 아닌 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10135">any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10136">세미코론(;), 슬래시(/) 또는 따오기 표시(")가 아닌 7-128자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10136">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10137">세미코론(;) 또는 인용 부호(")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10137">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10138">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10138">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10139">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10139">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10140">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10140">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10141">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10141">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10142">정규식은 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10142">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10143">검색된 CEP_GlobalFilter 찾을 **수** 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10143">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10144">정규식 CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder **패턴과** 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10144">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10145">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **일치하는** 콘텐츠를 찾지 못합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10145">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10146">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10146">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10147">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10147">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10148">some-password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10148">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10149">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10149">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10150">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10150">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10151">sample</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10151">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10152">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10152">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10153">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10153">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10154">암호 또는 pwd 다음에 0-2 공백, 등호(=), 0-2 공백 및 추가 표시(\*) --OR--</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10154">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) --OR--</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10155">암호 또는 pwd 다음을 입력합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10155">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10156">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10156">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10157">기호보다 작음(<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10157">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10158">대/소문자, 자릿수, 상용구(\*), 하이픈(-), 밑 줄(_) 또는 공백 문자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10158">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10159">기호보다 크다(>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10159">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10160">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10160">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10161">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10161">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10173">스웨덴 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10173">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10174">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10174">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10175">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10175">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10176">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10176">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10177">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10177">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10178">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10178">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10179">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10179">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10180">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10180">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10181">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10181">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10182">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10182">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10183">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10183">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10184">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10184">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10185">`Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10185">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10186">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10186">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10319">스웨덴 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10319">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10320">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10320">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10321">10 또는 12자리 숫자 및 선택적 분수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10321">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10322">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10322">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10323">10자리 또는 12자리 숫자와 선택적분리형:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10323">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10324">두 자리 숫자(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10324">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10325">YYMMDD 날짜 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10325">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10326">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10326">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10327">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10327">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10328">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10328">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10329">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10329">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10330">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10330">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10331">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10331">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10332">이 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10332">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10333">키워드가 `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10333">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10334">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10334">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10335">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10335">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10336">이 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10336">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-10337">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-10337">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```
