## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11052">미국 SSN(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11052">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11053">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11053">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11054">서식 있는 패턴 또는 서식 없는 패턴일 수 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11054">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11055">2011년 중반 전에 발급된 SSN의 서식은 강합니다. 여기서 숫자의 특정 부분이 유효한 범위 내에 있어야 합니다(체크 UM은 없음).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11055">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11056">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11056">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11057">네 가지 함수는 네 가지 다른 패턴에서 SSNS를 봐야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11057">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11058">Func_ssn 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정되어 있는 2011년 전 강력한 서식의 SSNS를 검색합니다(ddd-dd-d OR d d)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11058">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11059">Func_unformatted_ssn 9자리 연속 숫자(ddd)로 서식이 지정되지 않은 2011년 전 강력한 서식의 SSNS를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11059">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11060">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정된 2011년 후 SSNS를 검색합니다(ddd-dd-d OR ddd d)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11060">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11061">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 9자리 연속 숫자로폼이 없는 2011년 후 SSNS를 검색합니다(dddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11061">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11062">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11062">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11063">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11063">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11064">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11064">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11065">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11065">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11066">Func_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11066">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11067">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11067">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11068">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11068">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11069">이 Func_unformatted_ssn 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11069">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11070">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11070">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11071">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11071">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11072">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11072">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11073">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11073">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11074">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 55% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11074">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11075">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11075">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11076">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11076">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11091">미국/영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11091">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11092">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11092">passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11093">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11093">The U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11094">passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서 사용할 수 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11094">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11095">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11095">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11096">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11096">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11097">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11097">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11098">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11098">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11099">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11099">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11100">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11100">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11101">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11101">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11102">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11102">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11103">Func_usa_uk_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11103">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11104">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11104">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11125">우크라이나 여권 국내</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11125">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11126">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11126">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11127">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11127">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11128">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11128">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11129">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11129">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11130">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11130">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11131">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11131">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11132">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11132">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11133">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11133">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11134">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11134">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11135">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11135">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11136">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11136">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11137">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11137">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11138">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11138">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11139">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11139">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11140">regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11140">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11141">검색된 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11141">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11150">우크라이나 여권 국제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11150">Ukraine passport international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11151">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11151">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11152">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11152">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11153">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11153">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11154">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11154">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11155">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11155">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11156">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11156">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11157">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11157">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11158">8자 영문자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11158">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11159">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11159">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11160">8자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11160">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11161">2개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11161">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11162">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11162">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11163">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11163">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11164">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11164">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11165">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11165">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11166">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11166">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11167">regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11167">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11168">검색된 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11168">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11171">우크라이나 여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11171">ukraine passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11172">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11172">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11173">passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11173">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11174">паспорт України</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11174">паспорт України</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f26a-11175">номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f26a-11175">номер паспорта</span></span>
